bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Etiological Agent. of wind entering the human organism and causing a disease. Because it enters where it does not belong it is termed “evil”. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 1: 血氣俱虛，風邪 併入，在於陽則皮膚緩，在於陰則腹里急 , “When blood and qi are depleted, wind evil enters both. When it settles in the yang [section], the skin will be relaxed. When it settles in the yin [section], the skin will be tight”. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 frequently mentions “ wind evil ” as entering the brain, the depots, and the bone marrow, as passing into the heart, and as attacking the eyes to eventually cause a disease, as well as therapeutic strategies such as eliminating, or dissipating wind evil.
